name: Abandoned Tomagotchis
description:
As we all know human beings often abandon their pets, such as dogs and cats. What not everyone knows is that there are also abandoned Tomagotchis!

Your job is to take care of these Tomagotchis. Won't be easy. Remember that they are the baddest ones in the city, some of them are gluttonous, some are depressed, some has diabetes and some more problematic you'll discover.

The most important thing, don't let the Tomagotchis die! Good luck!

(All animations are pixel art handcrafted recreations)

CONTROLS

  1.  SELECT
  2.  EXECUTE
  3. CANCEL
